info.brief_description: You wake up one day and have been transformed into some object.
info.description:
You wake up one day and find you have been transformed into an object.

Not too many rules, but just a few...

1. The character transforms into an object. Can also shrink. But nothing else, no animal transformation, gender transformation etc.
2. The object can only be used by/the shrinkee can only be encountered by women, who must be no younger than teenage and no older than middle age.
3. No period stuff.

Other than that, anything goes. Have fun!
